name: The Summit
description: The Summit is a powerful and agile snowboard that's perfect for experienced riders who love to carve down steep and challenging terrain. With its responsive camber profile and stiff flex, this board provides excellent edge hold and stability at high speeds, while still allowing for quick and easy turn initiation. The Summit is designed for advanced to expert riders who demand the very best from their gear.

name: The Trailblazer
description: The Trailblazer is an all-around snowboard that excels on any terrain. With its hybrid bend and medium flex, this board provides a perfect balance of control, pop, and forgiveness. The Trailblazer is designed for riders of all levels who want a versatile board that can handle anything the mountain throws their way.

name: The Freeride
description: The Freeride is a high-performance snowboard designed for advanced riders who want to explore the backcountry and ride deep powder. With its directional shape, rocker-camber profile, and stiff flex, this board delivers excellent float and stability in all conditions. The Freeride is built to handle the most challenging terrain and give riders the confidence they need to push their limits and ride harder than ever before.

name: The Powder Hound
description: The Powder Hound is an expert-level snowboard built to handle the deepest powder and steepest terrain. With a rocker-camber-rocker profile, it provides exceptional float in powder while maintaining edge hold on variable snow. A stiff flex and directional shape give you the power and control you need to charge through anything the mountain can throw at you.

name: Koryfi 3-in-1 Ski Jacket
description: The Koryfi 3-in-1 Ski Jacket is a versatile and stylish option for all your winter adventures. With a waterproof rating of XX and a breathability rating of XX, this jacket will keep you warm and dry in the harshest weather conditions. The jacket features a removable inner layer that can be worn on its own for milder weather, or combined with the outer layer for extra insulation on colder days. The adjustable hood, cuffs, and hem, as well as the powder skirt and jacket-to-pant interface, provide extra protection against the elements. The Koryfi 3-in-1 Ski Jacket also comes with multiple pockets, including two chest pockets, two hand pockets, one sleeve pocket, and two internal pockets, allowing you to keep your essentials close at hand. Finally, the pit zips and mesh lining offer ventilation options for when you need to regulate your temperature.

name: The Flare
description: The Flare is a high-performance all-mountain snowboard that's perfect for riders who demand precision and control in any terrain. With its responsive camber and medium flex, this board delivers excellent edge-to-edge transition and stability at high speeds, while still allowing for easy turn initiation and playful riding. The Flare is designed for intermediate to advanced riders who want to push their limits and take their riding to the next level.

name: The Trip
description: The Trip is a versatile all-mountain snowboard designed to take you on a journey through any terrain. With a directional shape and medium flex, this board provides stability and control for carving on groomers, while its rocker profile and tapered tail offer float and maneuverability in powder. The Trip is suitable for intermediate to advanced riders looking for a one-board quiver to explore the mountain.

name: The Ultraviolet
description: The Ultraviolet is a true twin, freestyle snowboard that's built for the park and beyond. Its hybrid camber profile and medium flex provide the perfect balance of stability, pop, and forgiveness for all types of riding. The board's centered stance and symmetrical shape make it easy to ride switch and perfect for jibbing and spinning. Whether you're hitting rails or launching off jumps, The Ultraviolet will help you take your freestyle game to the next level.

name: The Maverick
description: The Maverick is a versatile all-mountain ski that's perfect for intermediate to advanced skiers looking to tackle any terrain. With its combination of camber underfoot and early rise rocker in the tip and tail, this ski offers great edge hold on hardpack and stability in variable conditions, while still being playful and easy to maneuver in softer snow. The Maverick is designed for skiers who want a ski that can handle anything the mountain throws at them.

name: The Apex
description: The Apex is an all-mountain ski designed for advanced skiers who demand the best. With its combination of early rise rocker in the tip and tail and camber underfoot, this ski offers excellent edge hold on hardpack and stability at high speeds. The Apex is also capable in softer snow thanks to its medium flex and versatile turn radius. This ski is perfect for skiers who want one pair of skis that can handle any condition on the mountain.

name: The Ascent
description: The Ascent is a backcountry ski that's designed to take you further and faster than ever before. With its lightweight construction and versatile design, it excels in any conditions you might encounter on the mountain. Featuring a combination of camber underfoot and rocker in the tip and tail, the Ascent provides great edge hold on firm snow, while remaining playful and maneuverable in soft snow. This is the perfect ski for skiers looking to explore new terrain and push their limits in the backcountry.

name: The Titan
description: The Titan is a powerful all-mountain ski that can handle any condition on the mountain. With its full camber construction, this ski offers superior edge hold on hardpack and a lively feel at high speeds. The Titan's medium-stiff flex and wide waist make it a versatile ski that can handle deeper snow and variable conditions with ease. This ski is perfect for advanced skiers looking for a high-performance all-mountain ski.

name: Men's Snow Gloves
description: Keep your hands warm and dry with these top-quality snow gloves. Made from a durable blend of nylon and polyester with leather accents, these gloves are built to withstand the toughest winter conditions. They are fully waterproof and windproof, so your hands stay dry and comfortable all day long. The breathable fabric ensures optimal ventilation and comfort, while the adjustable wrist strap provides a snug and secure fit. Available in a range of sizes and colors to suit any style or preference.

name: Cozy Knit Beanie
description: Stay warm and stylish this winter with our Cozy Knit Beanie. Made from a soft and durable acrylic yarn, this beanie features a classic ribbed design and a cute pom-pom on top. It's available in three colors to match any winter outfit.

name: Women's Snow Gloves
description: Keep your hands warm and dry with these top-quality snow gloves. Made from a durable blend of nylon and polyester with leather accents, these gloves are built to withstand the toughest winter conditions. They are fully waterproof and windproof, so your hands stay dry and comfortable all day long. The breathable fabric ensures optimal ventilation and comfort, while the adjustable wrist strap provides a snug and secure fit. Available in a range of sizes and colors to suit any style or preference.

name: Koryfi Fleece Jacket
description: Stay warm and comfortable with the Koryfi Fleece Jacket. Made from a high-quality blend of polyester and spandex, this jacket is soft, breathable, and provides excellent insulation. It features a full-zip front, two zippered hand pockets, and a stand-up collar to keep you protected from the elements. Available in a range of sizes and colors to suit any style or preference.
